title: Quaid-e-Azam united Muslims under one banner to create Pakistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 11 (APP): Chairman Prime Minister Youth Program Rana Mashhood Ahmad Khan on Wednesday said that Quaid-e-Azam Muhammad Ali Jinnah was a visionary leader who united the Muslims of India under one banner and achieved Pakistan.
In his message on the death anniversary of the country’s founder, which was annually observed on September 11, he emphasised the significance of Jinnah’s principles of “unity, faith and discipline” essential for the country’s development.
He said that the struggle of Quaid-e-Azam changed the destiny of the Muslims of the sub-continent and laid the foundation of the democratic system in Pakistan.
By following the teachings and guidance of Quaid-e-Azam, “Work, Work and Work only, We can make Pakistan a strong and prosperous country.”
